verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> advantage <S%G4053><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> hath the Jew <S%G2453><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the profit <S%G5622><s%> of circumcision <S%G4061><s%>?
Much4183, 2596 every <S%G3956><s%> way <S%G5158><s%>: first <S%G4412><s%> of all <S%G3754><s%>, that they were intrusted <S%G4100><s%> with the oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> were without faith <S%G4102><s%>? shall <S%G3361><s%> their <S%G846><s%> want of faith <S%G570><s%> make <S%G2673><s%> of none effect <S%G2673><s%> the faithfulness <S%G4102><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

God forbid <S%G1096><s%>: yea <S%G1161><s%>, let <S%G1096><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> found true <S%G227><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> a liar <S%G5583><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, That <S%G3704><s%> thou mightest be justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> mightest prevail <S%G3528><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> thou <S%G4571><s%> comest into judgment <S%G2919><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> commendeth <S%G4921><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%>? Is God <S%G2316><s%> unrighteous <S%G94><s%> who visiteth <S%G2018><s%> with wrath <S%G3709><s%>? (I speak <S%G3004><s%> after the manner <S%G2596><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.)
God forbid <S%G3361><s%>: <S%G1096><s%> for then <S%G1893><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall <S%G2919><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>?

But <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> lie <S%G5582><s%> abounded <S%G4052><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> am I also <S%G2504><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%>?

and <S%G2532><s%> why not <S%G3361><s%> (as <S%G2531><s%> we are slanderously reported <S%G987><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> affirm that <S%G5346><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>), <S%G3754><s%> Let us do <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> good <S%G18><s%> may come <S%G2064><s%>? whose <S%G3739><s%> condemnation <S%G2917><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> just <S%G1738><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? are we better <S%G4284><s%> than they <S%G3756><s%>? No, in no wise <S%G3843><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> we before laid to the charge <S%G4256><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%>, that they are <S%G1511><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>;
as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>, no <S%G3761><s%>, not one <S%G1520><s%>;
There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that understandeth <S%G4920><s%>, There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that seeketh after <S%G1567><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

They have <S%G1578><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> turned aside <S%G1578><s%>, they are <S%G889><s%> together <S%G260><s%> become unprofitable <S%G889><s%>; There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that doeth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G5544><s%>, no <S%G3756><s%>, not, so much as one <S%G2076><s%>: 2193, 1520

Their <S%G846><s%> throat <S%G2995><s%> is an open <S%G455><s%> sepulchre <S%G5028><s%>; With <S%G1100><s%> their <S%G846><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> they have used deceit <S%G1387><s%>: The poison <S%G2447><s%> of asps <S%G785><s%> is under <S%G5259><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lips <S%G5491><s%>:
Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> is full <S%G1073><s%> of cursing <S%G685><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bitterness <S%G4088><s%>:
Their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are swift <S%G3691><s%> to shed <S%G1632><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>;
Destruction <S%G4938><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> misery <S%G5004><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> have they <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%>:
There is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G561><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> what things soever <S%G3745><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, it speaketh <S%G2980><s%> to them that are <S%G3588><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> may be stopped <S%G5420><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> may be brought <S%G1096><s%> under the judgment <S%G5267><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>:

because <S%G1360><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall <S%G1344><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> cometh the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> a righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> hath been manifested <S%G5319><s%>, being witnessed <S%G3140><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>;

even <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that believe <S%G4100><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> distinction <S%G1293><s%>;
for <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fall short <S%G5302><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;

being justified <S%G1344><s%> freely <S%G1432><s%> by <S%G5485><s%> his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the redemption <S%G629><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> set forth <S%G4388><s%> to be a propitiation <S%G2435><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> show <S%G1732><s%> his <S%G846><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the passing over <S%G3929><s%> of the sins <S%G265><s%> done aforetime <S%G4266><s%>, in the forbearance of God;

for <S%G4314><s%> the showing <S%G1732><s%>, I say <S%G846><s%>, of his righteousness <S%G1343><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3568><s%> present season <S%G2540><s%>: that <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might himself be <S%G1511><s%> just <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the justifier <S%G1344><s%> of him that hath faith <S%G4102><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Where <S%G4226><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is the glorying <S%G2746><s%>? It is excluded <S%G1576><s%>. By <S%G1223><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> manner of law <S%G3551><s%>? of works <S%G2041><s%>? Nay <S%G3780><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>.
We reckon therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G3049><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>.

Or is <S%G2228><s%> God the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jews <S%G2453><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>? is he not <S%G3780><s%> the <S%G1161><s%> God of Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>? Yea <S%G3483><s%>, of Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>:

if so be <S%G1897><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he shall justify <S%G1344><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

Do we <S%G2673><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> make the law <S%G3551><s%> of none effect <S%G2673><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>? God forbid <S%G1096><s%>: nay <S%G235><s%>, we establish <S%G2476><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.
